meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Justin Bender Liz Hutchens Andrew Lee Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7410.

td.p: Justin Bender, a technical engineer from Boulder, Colorado
Liz Hutchens, a registered nurse from Lake Wylie, South Carolina
Andrew Lee, an aspiring TV writer from West Hollywood, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,002)

tr.td: STATES' HIGHEST POINTS
SLANG FOR LIQUOR
THIRD IN THE MOVIE SERIES
MAKE NO MYTHTAKE
CEOs
FEEL THE BURN

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Andrew
Liz
Justin
A LOT FOR THE OFFICE DOOR
GAME 7 PITCHERS
THE MAP OF SCIENCE
FRUITY WORDS & PHRASES
GRAND THEFT "OO"
(Alex: Each correct response will consist of two words--one with a double O and other without the double O.)
FEEL THE ROBERT BURNS!

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: What\'s the one word I stressed when I started the program today? "Welcome." Welcome.)
...
(Alex: [To Andrew] Whose first words in Cabaret were "Welcome"--"Willkommen, bienvenue, welcome.")
LizWho is Jack Lemmon?
$6,200
AndrewWho is Joel Grey
$5,801
JustinWho is Marlon Brando?
$700
Joel Grey')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He won a Tony & later an Oscar for the same role & decades later, published a memoir called "Master of Ceremonies"')

tr.td: ENTERTAINERS
He won a Tony & later an Oscar for the same role & decades later, published a memoir called "Master of Ceremonies"
Andrew
Liz
Justin
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $19,600
Andrew
Liz
Justin

17 R,
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

24 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W
